abstract: A 750-room hotel featuring the theme of exotic locations will open by early 2017 and cost about $550 million, the company said.
snippet: A 750-room hotel featuring the theme of exotic locations will open by early 2017 and cost about $550 million, the company said.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — The Walt Disney Company on Monday said that it planned to increase the number of hotel rooms at Hong Kong Disneyland by 75 percent following gains in attendance and profit at the eight-year-old resort.

headline.main: Attendance Up, Disney to Add Hotel Rooms at Hong Kong Park
headline.print_headline: Visitors Up, Disney to Add Hotel to Its Hong Kong Park
